file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 57-53-01-04 - OUTBOARD FLAP TRACK - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL OUTBOARD FLAP TRACK - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the outboard flap track. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 57-53-01-000-801-A OUTBOARD FLAP TRACK - REMOVAL OUTBOARD FLAP TRACK - INSTALLA- ALL 57-53-01-400-801-A TION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 57-53-01 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 57-53-01-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. OUTBOARD FLAP TRACK - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove the outboard flap track. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 27-50-00-000-801-A/400 INBOARD FLAP - REMOVAL C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task On the outboard flap I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Remove the outboard flap (AMM TASK 27-50-00-000-801-A/400). (2) Remove the access panels to remove the nuts from the outboard flap tracks. J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A CAUTION: DO NOT CHANGE THE POSITION OF THE BOLTS, WASHERS, AND NUTS TO PREVENT GALVANIC CORROSION. (1) Remove the nuts (1), washers (2), and bolts (3). (2) Remove the track (4). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 57-53-01 Page 2 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Outboard Flap Track - Installation Figure 401 B A ZONES 572 672 DET. A 1. NUT ( 7 ) 4. TRACK C 1. NUT ( 5 ) 4. TRACK 2. WASHER ( 7 ) 2 3. BOLT ( 5 ) DET. B 1 2 3. BOLT ( 7 ) 2. WASHER ( 5 ) 1 DET. C 2 APPLY SEALANT P/S 870C-12, ON THE BODY OF THE BOLT. 1 TORQUE: 70 TO 90 lb.in ( 7.9 TO 10.2 Nm ). 145AMM570042.MCE A EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 57-53-01 Page 3 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 57-53-01-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. OUTBOARD FLAP TRACK - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to install the outboard flap track. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 27-50-00-400-801-A/400 INBOARD FLAP - INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Torque wrench (0-200 lb.in) To torque the bolts that attach the tracks available E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) MIL-PRF-81733 Type IV - CLASS 1 Sealant P/S 870-C12 AR MEP 09-083 Sealant PR 2050 B-1/2 AR G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task On the outboard flap I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Examine the condition of the sealant applied to the track/support rib interface. Apply a new coat, if necessary. (2) Install the track (4). CAUTION: DO NOT AGAIN USE THE NUTS THAT CAN BE FINGER-TIGHTENED OR THAT SHOW SIGNS OF DAMAGE TO THE SELF-LOCKING ELEMENT. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 57-53-01 Page 4 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (3) Examine the condition of the nuts (1) used to attach the track (4). Replace them, if necessary. (4) Apply sealant P/S 870 C-12, on the body of the bolts (3). (5) Install the bolts (3), washers (2), and nuts (1) that attach the track (4) and tighten the bolts (3) in a crisscross pattern. (6) Torque the nuts (1) as necessary. (7) Apply sealant PR 2050 B-1/2 to the nuts (1). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the panels that give access to the nuts of the outboard flap tracks. (2) Install the outboard flap ( AMM TASK 27-50-00-400-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 57-53-01 Page 5 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
